mapper.select: SELECT distinct m.perms FROM `sys_user_role` ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE ur.`user_id` = #{userId} AND m.`menu_type` IN ('C','F') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`del_flag` = 0

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM `sys_menu` m WHERE m.`menu_type` IN ('C','M') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id,m.order_num

SELECT # /*IFNULL(m.perms,'') 代表如果为null，返回空字符串*/ DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM `sys_user_role` ur /*连表条件*/ LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE /*查询条件*/ ur.`user_id` = #{userId} AND m.`menu_type` IN ('C','M') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id,m.order_num

select m.id from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId}
order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
